description:
As a system administrator
  I want the video processing system to handle errors gracefully
  So that users receive appropriate feedback and the system remains stable

steps.name: the video processing system is running with queue support
the system uses mock services for testing
I have a file with "text" format
I upload the file to the queue endpoint
I should receive a 400 error
the error message should contain relevant information
the video processing system is running with queue support
the system uses mock services for testing
I have a file with "image" format
I upload the file to the queue endpoint
I should receive a 400 error
the error message should contain relevant information
the video processing system is running with queue support
the system uses mock services for testing
I have a file with "audio" format
I upload the file to the queue endpoint
I should receive a 400 error
the error message should contain relevant information
the video processing system is running with queue support
the system uses mock services for testing
I have a file with "document" format
I upload the file to the queue endpoint
I should receive a 400 error
the error message should contain relevant information
the video processing system is running with queue support
the system uses mock services for testing
I prepare an empty upload request
I send the upload request
I should receive a 400 error
the error should indicate that files are required
the video processing system is running with queue support
the system uses mock services for testing
I have a video file that exceeds size limits
I upload the oversized file
the error should mention file size restrictions
the video processing system is running with queue support
the system uses mock services for testing
the system is under heavy load
I attempt to upload a video file
the system should handle the load gracefully
I should receive an appropriate response
the system should remain responsive
the video processing system is running with queue support
the system uses mock services for testing
the queue system experiences temporary issues
I upload a video file
the system should handle the queue error
I should receive an informative error message
the system should not crash
the video processing system is running with queue support
the system uses mock services for testing
I access an invalid API endpoint
I make the request
I should receive a 404 error
the error should indicate the endpoint was not found
the video processing system is running with queue support
the system uses mock services for testing
I use an incorrect HTTP method
I make the request to a valid endpoint
the error should indicate the method is not allowed
the video processing system is running with queue support
the system uses mock services for testing
multiple users upload files simultaneously
all requests are processed
each request should be handled independently
no request should interfere with others
all responses should be appropriate
the video processing system is running with queue support
the system uses mock services for testing
the database becomes temporarily unavailable
I upload a video file
the system should handle the database error
I should receive a 500 error with appropriate message
the system should attempt to recover
the video processing system is running with queue support
the system uses mock services for testing
the file storage system has issues
I try to upload a video file
the system should detect the storage issue
I should receive an appropriate error response
the error should be logged for investigation

name: Error Handling in Video Processing System

description:
As a system operator
  I want to monitor and manage the video processing queue
  So that I can ensure optimal system performance and reliability

steps.name: the video processing system is running
the queue management system is operational
mock services are configured for testing
there are videos in the processing queue
I request queue statistics
I should receive current queue metrics
the metrics should include message count
the metrics should include consumer count
the metrics should include connection status
the metrics should include estimated processing time
the video processing system is running
the queue management system is operational
mock services are configured for testing
the processing queue is empty
I request queue statistics
I should receive zero message count
I should receive consumer information
the connection status should be healthy
the video processing system is running
the queue management system is operational
mock services are configured for testing
the queue system is operational
I check the system health status
I should see queue connectivity information
I should see processing statistics
all health indicators should show system status
the video processing system is running
the queue management system is operational
mock services are configured for testing
videos have been uploaded for processing
I request the processing status
I should see a list of all processed files
each file should have complete metadata
the total count should match the file list
the video processing system is running
the queue management system is operational
mock services are configured for testing
the system handles multiple video uploads
videos are added to the queue
the queue should accept new messages
the message count should increase appropriately
the system should provide accurate position estimates
the video processing system is running
the queue management system is operational
mock services are configured for testing
the queue system has multiple consumers
I check queue statistics
I should see the current consumer count
the consumer count should be accurate
processing estimates should reflect consumer capacity
the video processing system is running
the queue management system is operational
mock services are configured for testing
messages are added to the queue
I check queue statistics
messages should be persisted properly
the message count should be accurate
no messages should be lost
the video processing system is running
the queue management system is operational
mock services are configured for testing
I monitor queue statistics continuously
new videos are uploaded
queue metrics should update in real-time
all statistics should remain consistent
the system should handle monitoring requests efficiently
the video processing system is running
the queue management system is operational
mock services are configured for testing
the system is processing videos
I request detailed queue statistics
I should receive processing performance data
the data should include throughput information
estimated wait times should be calculated
metrics should help with capacity planning
the video processing system is running
the queue management system is operational
mock services are configured for testing
the queue system encounters issues
the system attempts to recover
queue functionality should be restored
statistics should reflect the recovery
no messages should be lost during recovery

name: Queue Management and Monitoring

description:
As a user
  I want to upload video files for background processing
  So that I can handle peak loads efficiently without losing requests

elements.name: Successfully upload single video for queue processing

steps.name: the video processing system is running with queue support
the RabbitMQ message broker is available
I have a valid MP4 video file
I upload the video file to the queue endpoint
the video should be queued successfully
I should receive a 202 accepted response
I should get queue position information
I should get estimated processing time

elements.name: Successfully upload multiple videos for queue processing

steps.name: the video processing system is running with queue support
the RabbitMQ message broker is available
I have 2 valid MP4 video files
I upload the video files to the queue endpoint
the videos should be queued successfully
I should receive a 202 accepted response
I should get queue position information for all videos
I should get estimated processing time for the batch

elements.name: Upload more than maximum allowed videos

steps.name: the video processing system is running with queue support
the RabbitMQ message broker is available
I have 4 video files
I upload the video files to the queue endpoint
I should receive a 400 error
the error message should indicate maximum files exceeded
the video processing system is running with queue support
the RabbitMQ message broker is available
I have an unsupported file format
I upload the file to the queue endpoint
I should receive a 400 error
the error message should indicate invalid file format
the video processing system is running with queue support
the RabbitMQ message broker is available
I have no files to upload
I upload to the queue endpoint
I should receive a 400 error
the error message should indicate files are required
the video processing system is running with queue support
the RabbitMQ message broker is available
I have a valid MP4 video file
I upload the video file to the single video endpoint
the video should be processed immediately
I should receive processing result or error response
the response should include frame information if successful

elements.name: Get processing status and queue statistics

steps.name: the video processing system is running with queue support
the RabbitMQ message broker is available
there are videos in the processing queue
I request the processing status
I should receive a list of all processed files
I should receive queue statistics
queue statistics should include message count and consumer count
queue statistics should include connection status
the video processing system is running with queue support
the RabbitMQ message broker is available
the queue system is operational
I request detailed queue statistics
I should receive current queue metrics
I should receive estimated wait time
metrics should include message count and consumer count
metrics should include connection status
the video processing system is running with queue support
the RabbitMQ message broker is available
there is a processed video file available
I request to download the frames ZIP file
I should receive the ZIP file or appropriate error
if successful the file should be properly formatted for download
the video processing system is running with queue support
the RabbitMQ message broker is available
the queue system encounters an error
I upload a video file
the system should handle the error gracefully
I should receive an appropriate error response
the error should be logged for debugging
the video processing system is running with queue support
the RabbitMQ message broker is available
the video processing system is running
I check the system status
I should see queue connectivity information
I should see processing statistics
the information should be current and accurate
